official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to permit persons adversely affected by an emergency suspension order to request an expedited hearing on the order.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to permit persons adversely affected by an emergency pesticide suspension order to request an expedited hearing on such order.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to permit persons adversely affected by an emergency suspension order to request an expedited hearing on the order.
